# <i class="fas fa-user section-icon"></i> About Me

Data Science & Analytics graduate student at California State University, Chico with a strong background in Computer Engineering. Currently pursuing Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics with a 3.52 GPA.

**Professional Summary:** I am an experienced professional with expertise in web development, data analysis, and machine learning. My technical skills span across Python, R, PHP, Java, and various data science tools. I have a strong background in software development and data visualization, coupled with proven leadership experience in student organizations. I am passionate about leveraging data to drive insights and create impactful solutions that make a difference.

**Key Achievements:** I have successfully led web development projects at Kohli Media LLP with 10 members, where I contributed to the company's digital presence. My work in machine learning includes developing models for autonomous vehicles, specifically focusing on speed breaker and lane detection. As the President of the Indian Student Association, I have demonstrated strong leadership skills, and my role as a Global Ally at International Education & Global Engagement has allowed me to support and mentor international students.
:::

# <i class="fas fa-project-diagram section-icon"></i> Projects

::: project-item
## <i class="fas fa-chart-line"></i> The Relationship between Child Nutrition Status and Economic Indicators in Global Regions

A comprehensive data analysis project examining global health and economic correlations:

- **Project Objective**: Examines the relationship between child nutrition status and economic indicators in global regions, focusing on how economic factors influence adolescent nutrition outcomes.

- **Research Methodology**:
  - Utilized datasets from UNICEF, WHO, and World Bank
  - Implemented comprehensive data analysis techniques
  - Applied statistical modeling for correlation analysis
  - Ensured data integrity and validation

- **Key Variables Analyzed**:
  - Child nutrition status indicators
  - Undernourishment levels
  - Population living below $1.90 per day threshold
  - Regional economic indicators

- **Findings & Analysis**:
  - Identified strong positive correlation (0.85) between undernourishment and poverty
  - Analyzed regional variations in nutrition outcomes
  - Evaluated economic impact on child health
  - Documented key patterns and trends

- **Impact & Recommendations**:
  - Highlighted importance of economic development
  - Identified need for policy interventions
  - Suggested targeted approaches for vulnerable populations
  - Provided framework for future research

- **Skills Applied**:
  - Advanced data analysis
  - Statistical modeling
  - Research methodology
  - Data visualization
  - Report writing
:::

::: project-item
## <i class="fas fa-car"></i> DETECTION OF LANE AND SPEED BREAKER WARNING SYSTEM FOR AUTONOMOUS VEHICLES USING MACHINE LEARNING ALGORITHM

A comprehensive system developed to enhance autonomous vehicle capabilities:

- **Project Overview**: Developed a comprehensive Lane Detection and Speed Breaker Warning System aimed at enhancing the capabilities of autonomous vehicles using advanced machine learning algorithms.

- **Technical Implementation**:
  - Utilized convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for lane detection
  - Implemented machine learning model for speed breaker detection
  - Developed real-time camera input analysis system
  - Created proactive vehicle adjustment mechanisms

- **Key Features**:
  - Lane boundary identification and tracking
  - Speed breaker detection across various types and conditions
  - Automated warning system for detected obstacles
  - Dynamic vehicle speed and suspension adjustment
  - Real-time processing and response system

- **Achievements**:
  - Successfully conducted extensive simulations and real-world testing
  - Achieved significant improvements in lane-keeping accuracy
  - Enhanced responsiveness to speed breakers
  - Contributed to overall safety and reliability of autonomous vehicles
  - Improved handling of diverse road conditions

- **Impact**:
  - Enhanced autonomous vehicle safety
  - Improved road condition adaptability
  - Advanced machine learning implementation
  - Practical real-world application
:::
